summary: SPRINT 2.1 Admin Global Listing Management - Complete E2E Testing. All core functionality working: admin login, listings API with all filters (country, status, search, dealer_only, category_id), pagination, and listing actions (force-unpublish, soft-delete). Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI fully operational with minor hydration warnings.

design_issues.issue: React hydration warnings in console for nested HTML elements (li>li, span>option, span>select, tr>span, span>tbody)
design_issues.impact: Cosmetic only - does not affect functionality

passed_tests: Force-unpublish action with status update verification
Soft-delete action with status update verification
UI filters integration with backend API
Total count and page indicators display
Action buttons visibility and state management

backend_api_tests.listings_basic_fetch: PASS - 39 listings returned with correct structure

frontend_ui_tests.navigation_to_listings: PASS - İlanlar menu item navigates correctly
frontend_ui_tests.listings_page_load: PASS - Page loads with title and context
frontend_ui_tests.search_filter_ui: PASS - Search input works and clears
frontend_ui_tests.pagination_controls: PASS - Prev/Next buttons present and functional
frontend_ui_tests.action_buttons: PASS - Force-unpublish and Soft-delete buttons present
frontend_ui_tests.action_modal: PASS - Modal opens with reason/note fields
